text: Ne tviy tse obovʺyazok vesty yikh pryamym shlyakhom. Tse Allah vede pryamym shlyakhom toho, koho pobazhaye! A te dobro, yake zhertvuyete vy — tse zh dlya vas samykh. Zhertvuyete vy tse, lyshe prahnuchy do lyku Allaha. A za te, shcho vytrachayete vy, vidplatyatʹ spovna vam i ne vchynyatʹ iz vamy nespravedlyvo
